Active Planned Care / GoalsStart DateReason
Musculoskeletal care21-Sep-2017Osteoarthritis of knee
  • Reduce knee pain severity to improve mobility and quality of life.
  • Increase ability to perform activities of daily living without knee limitation.
  • Achieve at least 150 minutes of moderate physical activity per week.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease clinical management plan03-May-1992Pulmonary emphysema (disorder)
  • Minimize the number of acute COPD exacerbations requiring medical intervention over the next 12 months
  • Increase forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1) to at least 1.5 liters
  • Maintain peripheral oxygen saturation (SpO2) at or above 92% at rest
  • Patient will abstain from tobacco use continuously
  • Patient will walk at least 300 meters in 6 minutes
Lifestyle education regarding hypertension10-Jul-1988Essential hypertension (disorder)
  • Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg through lifestyle modifications
  • Limit daily sodium intake to less than 2.3 grams
  • Achieve at least 5% reduction in body weight
  • Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic activity per week
